text: Ren Zhengfei (; born 25 October 1944) is a Chinese entrepreneur and engineer. He is the founder and CEO of Shenzhen-based Huawei. As of February 2019, he had a net worth of US$1.3 billion. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:Chinese engineers Category:People from Guizhou
title: Ren Zhengfei
